channel.title: Popular?
channel.description:
Ok well ive designed a site, it's related to rsps community, runescape private server community, how would i start by getting it popular, like say as an example, mopar has like 317k members, how would i get started, and no i'm not going to advertise on mopar, as in pm everyone saying omg join pls dude omg!, hope i can get your guy's inputs,
Thanks, Denoria.

item.title: Popular?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:8, topic:273920”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=361955.msg2751674#msg2751674 date=1239943420]
Your site is literally one of thousands of carbon copies of Mscp. I doubt yours will be very popular. And if you do manage to get a decent userbase(e.g. 20 or 30 members), it won’t last. I wouldn’t waste my time if I were you.
[/quote]

It should do OK. Unlike around 80% of mscp copys this webiste has it’s own .com domain/doesnt use smfforfree…
I just looked around your forum and its interesting to see how you use the exact same staff images as mitb: [/quote]Mhmm, I’m just temp using them, had full permission from Niall.

Read full topic

item.title: Popular?
item.dc:creator: @Creme_de_la_Creme Creme de la Creme
item.description:
@Creme_de_la_Creme wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

Your site is literally one of thousands of carbon copies of Mscp. I doubt yours will be very popular. And if you do manage to get a decent userbase(e.g. 20 or 30 members), it won’t last. I wouldn’t waste my time if I were you.

I’d say it was more of a [sup]13[/sup]Carbon copy if you’re talking about the type that wont last.

No seriously, it wont. It doesn’t work unless you want to pay for adwords (usually pointless if you don’t get the return in adsense). It just gets you hated everywhere because people will spam your site thinking they’re helping you. Then when other people realise it’s harming the site, they’ll do it some more. You’ll get personal attacks, you’ll get hate mail, you’ll have to deal with frequent DDoS attacks (never mind the downtime, it does no good to your servers).

Read full topic

And if you do manage to get a decent userbase(e.g. 20 or 30 members), it won’t last. I wouldn’t waste my time if I were you.[/quote]Where do i just start though…to get atleast 15 members?
